blogPost.excerpt: Join us for weekly fireside chats with iconic product leaders: Feb 4: Manik Gupta, former CPO at Uber and product leader at Google Maps Feb 11: Jiaona Zhang, VP of Product at Webflow Feb 18: Sriram Krishnan, previously at Snap, Twitter, and Facebook
blogPost.body: Join us for weekly fireside chats with iconic product leaders: Feb 4: Manik Gupta, former CPO at Uber and product leader at Google Maps Feb 11: Jiaona Zhang, VP of Product at Webflow Feb 18: Sriram Krishnan, previously at Snap, Twitter, and Facebook
blogPost.title: UserLeap: The Biggest Launch Series - Learn what makes or breaks a successful product launch
blogPost.author: Ryan Glasgow

localize.description: 加入我们的每周炉边聊天，与标志性的产品领袖一起。2月4日：Manik Gupta，Uber前CPO，谷歌地图产品负责人 2月11日：Jiaona Zhang，Webflow产品副总裁 2月18日：Sriram Krishnan，曾就职于Snap、Twitter和Facebook。
localize.tagline: 了解成功的产品发布的成败因素

localize.description: 加入我們的每週爐邊聊天，與標誌性的產品領袖一起。2月4日：Manik Gupta，Uber前CPO，谷歌地圖產品負責人 2月11日：Jiaona Zhang，Webflow產品副總裁 2月18日：Sriram Krishnan，曾就職於Snap、Twitter和Facebook。
localize.tagline: 瞭解成功的產品發佈的成敗因素

previous.excerpt: Make your user interface a little bit better by receiving weekly UI/UX insights. If you're a developer, solo-founder, product manager, or you feel the pain of user interface design this newsletter is specially for you.
previous.title: UserInterface.io - Weekly UI/UX tips in your inbox for free

localize.description: 通过接收每周的UI/UX见解，让你的用户界面变得更好一点。如果你是开发者、独创者、产品经理，或者你感受到了用户界面设计的痛苦，这本时事通讯是专门为你准备的。
localize.tagline: 每周在您的收件箱中免费发送UI/UX提示。

localize.description: 通過接收每週的UI/UX見解，讓你的用戶界面變得更好一點。如果你是開發者、獨創者、產品經理，或者你感受到了用戶界面設計的痛苦，這本時事通訊是專門爲你準備的。
localize.tagline: 每週在您的收件箱中免費發送UI/UX提示。

next.title: Covid-19 hospitalizations in the US were down 11% over the past week, the 60th consecutive day of week-over-week declines. Down 72% from their peak on Jan 6. 🙏 https://t.co/vV41Xn8DVX

localize.full_text: 过去一周，美国科维德-19住院人数下降11%，这是连续60天周环比下降。较1月6日的峰值下降72%。🙏 https://t.co/vV41Xn8DVX
過去一週，美國科維德-19住院人數下降11%，這是連續60天周環比下降。較1月6日的峯值下降72%。🙏 https://t.co/vV41Xn8DVX
